activation_url.description: Full activation URL to retrieve the access token. It will be empty if the token is already retrieved.

created_at.description: Time at which this recipient token was created, in epoch milliseconds.

expiration_time.description: Expiration timestamp of the token in epoch milliseconds.

id.description: Unique ID of the recipient token.

updated_at.description: Time at which this recipient token was updated, in epoch milliseconds.
